judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT CHANDIGARH Civil Writ Petition No.10175 of 1990 Date of decision:12.05.2010 Dalip Singh (deceased) through his L.Rs. and others .Petitioners

versus Additional Director of Panchayats, Punjab, Chandigarh and another. Respondents CORAM: HON BLE MR. JUSTICE K. KANNAN ------ Present: Mr. Gurcharan Singh, Advocate, for the petitioners. Mr. Manohar Lall, Additional Advocate General, Punjab, as Amicus Curiae. ----- . Whether reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the judgment? . To be referred to the reporters or not? . Whether the judgment should be reported in the digest? ----- K.Kannan, J For orders, see Civil Writ Petition No.9920 of 1989 of even date. (K.KANNAN) .05.2010 JUDGE

sanjeev
